name: Lollolcee
description: I am looking for a kind, intelligent and open minded man. I have a small child and I understand that some men will be put off by that, therefore I am looking for a man who will accept and love my child as his own and will treat her with love and care. A man who is not afraid of holding hands in public and giving me a sweet kiss on the cheek because affection to me very important to me, to feel like a desired woman. Someone with a fabulous sense of humor, a little cheeky but will need to have a positive mental attitude and be able to smile and laugh with me. Also, someone who is ready for not only a relationship but also to begin building a strong family. A career motivated and ambitious individual, who tends to be spontaneous but at the same time attentive and warm in his gestures and attitude towards me.
